content: cute little stuffed wool hearts these knit up quickly in the round and can be used as decorations gift toppers added to garland wreaths vases and more size 3 7 5 cm wide 2 5 6 5 cm wide yarn and materials worsted weight wool each heart uses approximately 11 yards 10 meters and a small amount of poly-fil or stuffing of choice i used knitpicks wool of the andes in the following colours blossom heather light pink rose heather medium pink hollyberry dark red needles and tools set of us7 4 5mm double point needles darning needle stitch holder or circular needle us7 or smaller
